meeting_request.purpose: Need help staying in my history major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I'm Kim, a second year history major. Last semester was really tough — I struggled in my history of Europe course and got a D- on the final exam. I’m not sure if I’m doing something wrong this year, or if I’m just not cut out for the major. I’m trying to stay in the department, but it’s not helping. I’m interested in internships and career paths related to history, but I’m not sure how to get involved or what courses I should be taking to get ready. I’m also interested in exploring other majors, but I don’t know if history is the right fit for me. I want to talk to someone about how to stay in my major and improve my academic performance.
